word: H3644 - כְּמֹו - kᵉmôw - kem-o' - According to

sections.paragraph: போது, இவ்விதம், அப்படிப்பட்ட, போன்றபடி, போல, அப்படியே - எச்சம்
like, as, the like of which, when, according as, as it were

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A form of the prefix K, but used separately (compare H3651); as, thus, so: - according to, (such) as (it were, well as), in comparison of, like (as, to, unto), thus, when, worth.
Cognate: H3644, H834
